text: Antonio José Colorado Laguna (born September 8, 1939) is an American lawyer and politician. He was Secretary of State of Puerto Rico from 1990 to 1992 and Resident Commissioner of Puerto Rico from 1992 to 1993 under the administration of Rafael Hernández Colón. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:Resident commissioners of Puerto Rico Category:Secretaries of state of Puerto Rico Category:Politicians from New York City Category:Lawyers from New York City Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Antonio Colorado
